title: Bitcoin Continues to Fall After Hitting All-Time High. Is This Fine?
description: Bitcoin deflates over 8%, mirroring past volatility as it falls to $62,000. One expert isn’t worried.

title: Bitcoin Sets New All-Time High—But What's the Actual Record Price?
description: Some crypto price aggregators said Bitcoin hit a new high today. Some disagreed. Does that discrepancy really matter?

title: Bitcoin and gold are becoming increasingly correlated in conservative investment strategies
description:
In a striking turn of financial events, gold and Bitcoin (BTC) have both soared to record-breaking highs, signaling a shift in investor sentiment that appears to diverge from traditional expectations related to monetary policy and interest rate cuts. Analyst Noelle Acheson recently highlighted these trends, noting that their timing coincides with a period where anticipations […]

The post Bitcoin and gold are becoming increasingly correlated in conservative investment strategies appeared first on CryptoSlate.
